dict.acceptation: 组织，编组，创立；〈口〉使（自己思想）有条理；使有器官，给与…生机，使有机化；使组成工会，使加入工会；

sent.orig: The verbs arrange, organize and plan all have two main meanings.
sent.trans: arrange,organize,plan这三个动词都含有两层主要意思。

sent.orig: Board meeting preparation work, meeting translation, meeting minutes organize and translation and document file organize.
sent.trans: 董事会资料，决议汇总和相关准备工作，会议现场翻译，纪要整理和翻译并归档。

sent.orig: Test can be used to organize, organize staff capacity test, human resources evaluation.
sent.trans: 可以使用来组织考试，组织员工能力测试、人力资源测评。

sent.orig: Organize and coordinate annual meeting and various staff activities and organize visitor reception and relations outside.
sent.trans: 组织协调公司年会。各类会议及员工活动，组织好来客接待和相关的外联工作。

sent.orig: These areas organize distributing make cross continent the connection between is able to develop.
sent.trans: 这些地区组织的分布使跨洲间的联系得以发展。
